participant_1.background:
My family works in various fields, but we all have a passion for life.
I remember writing stories with my sister when we were kids.
i recently broke up with my girlfriend.
i don t have a lot of friends.
I remember the good times I had as a kid and remind myself that I can still have fun now.

participant_2.background:
I am pretty close with my family.
i like to create websites.
I don't care what the weather is as long as I get to wear my pink hiking boots.
I've started to write short stories in my spare time.
I loved watching my dog run around in the backyard.

content.text: Hello! I'm a big fan of writing stories.
Hey there! I recently started writing short stories.
What inspired you to start writing short stories?
I've always loved to write but never had the time until recently.
That's awesome! I wish I had the time to write more.
What kind of stories do you like to write?
I like to write realistic stories based on my life experiences.
That's cool! I like to write fantasy stories.
I love fantasy stories too! I wish I was creative enough to come up with my own stories.
You should give it a try! It's a lot of fun.
I think I will! Thanks for the inspiration!
No problem! I'm always happy to talk about writing.
Me too! I love talking to other writers.
